metadata.title: CVE-2019-20485 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: qemu/qemu_driver.c in libvirt before 6.0.0 mishandles the holding of amonitor job during a query to a guest agent, which allows attackers tocause a denial of service (API blockage).

criterions.comment: libvirt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
